SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. Each player has a nickname, a connection status, a hand of cards, a play area, a secret objective card, and a map that traces the number of resources and special objects in his play area.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname)
      Constructs a player with the specified nickname. The player is initially connected, and their play area is initialized with dimensions of 81x81 cells. The stock map is initialized with default value of 0 for each type of resource and special object.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.

  • Method Details

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Gets the nickname of the player.
      Returns:
      The nickname of the player.

    • getStock

      public Map<CornerContent,Integer> getStock()

    • setStock

      public void setStock(Map<CornerContent,Integer> stock)

    • initializeHand

      public void initializeHand(List<PlayableCard> hand)
      Initializes the player's hand with the specified list of cards.
      Parameters:
      hand - The list of cards to initialize the player's hand.

    • initializePlayArea

      public void initializePlayArea(StarterCard starterCard)
      Initializes the player's play area with the provided starter card. Places the starter card in the centre of the play area on the specified side. Updates the resources and special objects stock depending on the played side of the card.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The starter card to initialize the player's play area.

    • initializePlayArea

      public void initializePlayArea(Card[][] playArea)

    • setSecretObjective

      public void setSecretObjective(ObjectiveCard secretObjective)
      Sets the secret objective card for the player.
      Parameters:
      secretObjective - The secret objective card to set for the player.

      public ObjectiveCard getSecretObjective()

      public Card[][] getPlayArea()
      Gets the player's play area.
      Returns:
      The player's play area.

    • placeCard

      public int placeCard(PlayableCard placedCard, Coordinates coordinates)
      Places a card on the player's play area at the specified position. Removes the placed card from the player's hand. Updates the player stock.
      Parameters:
      placedCard - The card to be placed.
      coordinates - The x-coordinate and y-coordinate position.

    • hasEnoughStock

      public void hasEnoughStock(GoldCard playedCard) throws InvalidMoveException
      Checks if the player has enough stock to play the specified gold card.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card to be played.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - If the player doesn't have enough stock to play the card.

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Coordinates coordinates) throws InvalidMoveException
      Checks if a move to place a card at the specified coordinates is valid.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The coordinates where the card is to be placed.
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, otherwise False.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - If the move is not valid.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(PlayableCard drawnCard)
      Adds a drawn card to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - The card drawn by the player.

    • objectiveScoreCalculator

      public int objectiveScoreCalculator(List<ObjectiveCard> commonObjectives, ObjectiveCard secretObjective)
      Calculates the final score of the player based on common objective cards and the resource stock.
      Parameters:
      commonObjectives - A list of common objective cards.
      secretObjective - is the secretObjective of the player
      Returns:
      The player's final score calculated based on common objective cards and the resource stock.
